visual.name: BIPM-DP+
visual.description: Process mining discovery and performance with animation

dataRoles.description: (Required) Case Identity (numeric value) for process mining.
dataRoles.name: case

dataRoles.description: (Required) Timestamp field for process mining (this field can be in numeric or tiemstamp with just declaring the ordering time).
dataRoles.name: time

dataRoles.description: (Optional) End Timestamp field for process mining (this field can be in numeric or tiemstamp with just declaring the ordering time).
dataRoles.name: timeE

showSibarWindowsSetting.description: The visibility of the left, bottom, and top windows plus inculde/exclude features on clicking visibility is turned ON/Off

showSliderSetting.description: The visibility of the left range slider is turned ON/Off

showMoreOption.description: The visibility of the more option button is turned ON/Off

showKeepGraph.description: The visibility of the Keep/Retrieve button is turned ON/Off

showSecLabel.displayName: Show the second Label for each Node

nodeSecLabel1.description: The second text label of link

nodeSecLabel7.description: The second text label of link

nodeSecLabelNoTime1.description: The second text label of link

nodeSecLabelNoTime2.description: The second text label of link

nodeSecLabelNoTime3.description: The second text label of link

nodeColor.description: The measure value setting for adjusting the color and the thickness of nodes

nodeColorNoTime.description: The measure value setting for adjusting the color and the thickness of nodes

labelFontSize.description: The measure value setting for adjusting the font size of labels of nodes

labelFontSizeNoTime.description: The measure value setting for adjusting the font size of labels of nodes

highlightColor.description: the color of the highlighted Node

lineFontSize.description: The measure value setting for adjusting the font size of labels of links

lineOpacity.description: The measure value setting for the link color opacity

highlightColor.description: The color of the highlighted link

fontSize.description: The font Size of links label
